title: üå≤ TreeJobs ‚Äî Your Gateway to Blockchain Careers
description: TreeJobs is a modern, visually striking Web3 job board focused on showcasing career opportunities at crypto and blockchain startups across the Americas, primarily targeting Seed to Series A companies. Built with a blend of cutting-edge tools like Next.js, Chakra UI, Framer Motion, React Three Fiber, and **Sanity CMS**, TreeJobs aims to connect top talent with high-potential early-stage Web3 teams. --- ## üöÄ Live Demo [https://treejobs.vercel.app](https://teree-job-board.vercel.app) <!-- Replace with actual link --> --- ## üß© Features - üîç **Curated Web3 Jobs** ‚Äî Focused on startups that are Seed to Series A stage. - üåê **Beautiful Landing Page** ‚Äî Built with Chakra UI, GSAP, and Framer Motion animations. - üß† **3D Visuals** ‚Äî Uses React Three Fiber to render interactive 3D orbs and scenes. - üßæ **Content Management** ‚Äî Static site content is powered by **Sanity CMS**, enabling easy updates to marketing text and section descriptions without code changes. - üíº **Featured Companies Section** ‚Äî Highlights top blockchain companies and their career pages. - üì± **Responsive Design** ‚Äî Fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices. --- ## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack | Category        | Technologies | |----------------|--------------| | Frontend       | Next.js, React, TypeScript | | UI Framework   | Chakra UI | | Animations     | GSAP, Framer Motion | | 3D Graphics    | React Three Fiber | | CMS            | **Sanity.io** (for static site text) | | Hosting        | Vercel | | Backend Jobs Scraper | Python + PostgreSQL (planned) | --- ## üì¶ New Update: Sanity CMS Integration ### ‚úÖ What Changed TreeJobs now integrates **Sanity CMS** to manage static text content across the landing page, such as: - Hero section headings and subheadings - About section content - Value proposition texts - Featured company descriptions - Any other marketing-related static content ### üîß Why This Matters - **Non-technical team members** can update content without touching code. - **Faster iteration** on marketing copy and SEO improvements. - Supports **real-time previewing** and structured content types. ### üß† How It Works - Content is authored and stored in Sanity Studio. - The frontend uses Sanity's GROQ API to fetch the content during static site generation (SSG) or ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration). - Types are generated with `@sanity-codegen/types` or defined manually for safer TypeScript integration. --- ## üß∞ Scripts ```bash # Start development server npm run dev # Build for production npm run build # Lint the code npm run lint

cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager, 
I am an ambitious Web3 Engineer and DeFi Bot Developer, Lucas Rizzo, interested in the exciting position at Teree Jobboard's TreeJobs. With a strong background in blockchain development and a deep passion for Web3, I am confident that I would be a valuable asset to your dynamic team. 

My experience as a blockchain developer, specializing in smart contracts and liquidation bots, aligns perfectly with TreeJobs' focus on crypto and blockchain roles. I have an extensive understanding of the blockchain ecosystem, having spent over 300 hours developing and refining these systems. 

I was particularly drawn to TreeJobs' innovative use of cutting-edge technologies, including Sanity CMS, to create a seamless and visually stunning job board. As an engineer, I appreciate the blend of frontend and backend tools, such as Next.js, Chakra UI, and React Three Fiber, which contribute to an optimal user experience. 

Understanding the importance of efficient and accessible content management, I believe the integration of Sanity CMS for static content is a brilliant solution. The ability to iterate quickly and efficiently on marketing copy will ensure that the platform remains fresh and engaging. 

My skill set, encompassing Solidity, Smart Contracts, and TypeScript, along with my strategic approach to technical positioning, makes me well-suited for this role. I am confident that I can contribute to the further development of TreeJobs, helping to connect the best talent with emerging Web3 opportunities. 

I would be delighted to join your team and be a part of the TreeJobs mission. I look forward to the possibility of discussing my potential value to your company in person. 

Thank you for considering my application. I have attached my resume for your review. 

Sincerely, 
Lucas Rizzo
